name: Eleven Shades of Pong
description: A small project created by a beginner game developer "SparrowDev". Test your skills in eleven different versions of a simple yet popular game "Pong". Beat your high scores, play with friends and most importantly have a great time! Also, consider leaving a comment regarding your experiences with this game as it would help me a lot in future game development! That is all from me, feel free to download the game and have a wonderful time!
